Pre-start. Checks to be by both Symonite and main contractor.
Siderise QA has been completed.
Wrap QA has been completed.
Check framing layout provides adequate fixing points to be able to meet the required fixing centres.
Check all window, door and corner flashings are completed
Joinery and TPO protection in place
Alum Support Bracket INSTALLATION. Initial checks to be by Symonite Installer.
Size, Location and centres are in accordance to set out drawing.
Apply Vaproshim or vaprotape to all screw pentrations.
Correct screws used as per drawings for timber and concrete
Vertical Rail Support INSTALLATION. Initial checks to be by Symonite Installer.
Plumbed and straight.Check alignment and cavity is as per shop drawings and set out drawings.
Apply Vaproshim and/or vaprotape to all screw pentrations.
Ensure SPAX screws are straight with the rubber washer in tact
Ensure fixing at 800crs is achieved
Final check of alignment with straight edge
Alucolux Panels INSTALLATION. Initial checks to be by Symonite Installer.
Check panel numbers match insdtall plan for the location
Check the Alucolux Panel is seating perfectly onto the pins. Plumb and straight with correct space
Panel secured properly as per shop drawing details.
Internal corner angle installed and sealed.
Install interstorey flashings as per shop drawings.
Downpipe Shrouds and Flashings by Symonite
Soffit flashings installed straight with correct fixings & Sealant
Install shroud and check alignment with full height stringlines
All panel plastic and sealant tapes removed.
CLEAN UP. Initial checks to be by Symonite Installer. If necessary give details on separate sheet.
Remove all rubbish from work area and dispose of as per site instructions.
Ensure all plastic removed from panels and free from defects
All unused materials moved to next work area or returned to ground level
Completion
Confirm work area clean, tidy and all quality assurance issues resolved in this area.
